programme.title: La Casa
programme.desc: Inspired by real events. Responding to an urgent call for help, a police officer becomes trapped by the evil spirits of a cursed house.

programme.title: Circus of the Dead
programme.desc: A sadistic group of clowns kidnap an unsuspecting man and his daughters, forcing him to play a deadly game in order to save his family.

programme.title: Haus of Horror
programme.desc: Horror is everywhere you look nowadays; have you wondered how that happened? Haus of Horror is here to explore the influence of horror far and wide. From fashion, food, lifestyle to fake blood, Vanessa will cover it all.

programme.title: Butt Boy
programme.desc: Detective Fox loves work and alcohol. After he goes to AA, his sponsor, Chip, becomes the main suspect of his investigation for a missing kid. Fox believes people are disappearing up Chip’s butt.

programme.title: House of Evil
programme.desc: Set in the early 70's, House of Evil tells the story of a young couple, John and Kate, that move into an old mansion in the countryside. Soon they discover that the house is haunted by the Devil himself, who want to possess them and enter the world.

programme.title: Old 37
programme.desc: Disguised as paramedics, two psychopaths intercept 911 calls and hunt down unsuspecting teenage accident victims in a stolen ambulance known as Old 37.

programme.title: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: The harrowing story of stuntman Kane Hodder who survived a near-death burn accident to eventually become FRIDAY THE 13th's Jason. An on-screen legend, Hodder has killed more people on screen than any other actor.

programme.title: La Casa
programme.desc: Inspired by real events. Responding to an urgent call for help, a police officer becomes trapped by the evil spirits of a cursed house.

programme.title: Circus of the Dead
programme.desc: A sadistic group of clowns kidnap an unsuspecting man and his daughters, forcing him to play a deadly game in order to save his family.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 1
programme.desc: Documentary web series about unexplained mysteries, urbanl egends and unsolved cases originating and/or trending on the internet.

programme.title: Butt Boy
programme.desc: Detective Fox loves work and alcohol. After he goes to AA, his sponsor, Chip, becomes the main suspect of his investigation for a missing kid. Fox believes people are disappearing up Chip’s butt.

programme.title: House of Evil
programme.desc: Set in the early 70's, House of Evil tells the story of a young couple, John and Kate, that move into an old mansion in the countryside. Soon they discover that the house is haunted by the Devil himself, who want to possess them and enter the world.

programme.title: Old 37
programme.desc: Disguised as paramedics, two psychopaths intercept 911 calls and hunt down unsuspecting teenage accident victims in a stolen ambulance known as Old 37.

programme.title: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: The harrowing story of stuntman Kane Hodder who survived a near-death burn accident to eventually become FRIDAY THE 13th's Jason. An on-screen legend, Hodder has killed more people on screen than any other actor.

programme.title: Sleepless Beauty
programme.desc: A young woman, Mila, is kidnapped by a mysterious and dangerous organization known as Recreation. Forced to stay awake and under constant surveillance, Mila must fight for control of her own mind.

programme.title: Cannibals and Carpet Fitters
programme.desc: A group of carpet fitters are sent on a job to an old country house in the middle of nowhere. They soon discover it is a trap set up by a savage, cannibalistic family. The carpet fitters are forced to fight for their lives or risk ending up being the evenings dinner. Cannibals and Carpet Fitters is a gruesomely fun thrill ride that will keep you in your seat until the very last minute.

programme.title: Amber's Descent
programme.desc: After surviving a violent encounter, renowned pianist, Amber Waltz, relocates to a rural farmhouse to complete her latest symphony. When the music mysteriously begins writing itself, Amber slowly discovers that this piece could be her last.
